page.title: 09INDUSTRY (FROYLE/HOLYBOURNE)
page.content:
There are no real factories in our block but in Holybourne there is an agricultural firm who{repair farm {machinery} and sell secondhand tractors, combines, etc., using spare land for storage.
There is a {sawmill}in Upper Froyle.
The most important development of all in our area this year is that of the oil industry. Oil will be pumped underground in pipes from wells at Herriard, Hesters Copse and Humbly Grove to a new{oil terminal}being constructed between Holybourne and Mill Court, for the gathering and production station at Weston Common. Lorries will transport the oil at regular hourly intervals to the Fawley refinery.
